page.title: 13A Day in the Life of Stephen
page.content:
When we got home I changed into my old clothes. I called for my friends Paul, who lives next door, Marc who lives opposite and together with Roy we went down the lane to the corner of the nearby wood where we made a den. No-one could see us from the lane.
Later on Mum came looking for us as it was time for tea. After tea we played on the{microcomputer}using the{games {cassettes}of 'Hopper', 'Bandits at 3 o'clock' and 'Overdrive'.
Finally we got washed, changed into our pyjamas and went to bed at the end of a typical day in our school holidays.
